customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Long ago, a merchant who lost his memory was wandering in the rainforest and wandered into the Withering by accident, and found himself surrounded by monsters. Thankfully, nearby Forest Rangers saved him in time. As of the present, the merchant has used this experience as a whetstone for his resolve, seeking to channel the intensity he witnessed in that moment to overcome all the challenges in his life...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule â€” Withering Corrosion: After you opponent uses a Skill, remove 1 Candle of Life point. Once all 5 Candle of Life points are depleted, you lose the match.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
